text: Wild Mood Swings is the tenth studio album by English gothic rock band The Cure. It was released on 6 May, 1996 through Fiction Records and went to number 9 in the United Kingdom and Switzerland, number 12 in the United States and Austria, number 10 in New Zealand and number 5 in Sweden. It received mixed reviews and was seen as a disappointment from their previous two albums. ==Track listing== All songs by Bamonte, Cooper, Gallup, O'Donnell and Smith. ;Bonus track == References == Category:1996 albums Category:The Cure albums Category:Elektra Records albums
title: Wild Mood Swings
